product_name: The North Face Matthes Crest 72 Pack
long_description: With a durable and full-featured design, The North Face Matthes Crest 72 pack delivers sweet comfort and performance for multi-day summit attempts and treks. Suspension has a dialed fit that improves large load control without sacrificing ventilation; shoulder harness slides up or down to match your back length and locks in place. To create a snug-fitting hipbelt, flip down the lumbar pad and adjust the cams located at the base of the pack. Aluminum stays and polyethylene frame sheet frame offer load support while encouraging freedom of movement across technical terrain. Top-loading main compartment also features an additional panel zip opening for quick access to gear. The North Face Matthes Crest 72 pack features interior pocket, gear-attachment points, removable top lid and ski carry loops.
short_description: With a durable and full-featured design, The North Face Matthes Crest 72 pack delivers sweet comfort and performance for multi-day summit attempts and treks.
